title: When I was young, I observed that nine out of 10 things I did were failures, so I did 10 times more work.
author: George Bernard

title: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
author: Andy Warhol

title: God bless the whole world. No exceptions.
author: Unknown

title: To guarantee success, act as if it were impossible to fail.
author: Dorothea Brande

title: Nothing will ever be attempted, if all possible objections must first be overcome.
author: Samuel Johnson

title: Demand the best from yourself, because others will demand the best from you… Successful people don’t simply give a project hard work. They give it their best work.
author: Win Borden

title: If you are not criticized, you may not be doing much.
author: Donald H. Rumsfeld

title: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude. Don’t complain.
author: Maya Angelou

title: The only person who cannot be helped is that person who blames others.
author: Carl Rogers

title: Trouble is only opportunity in work clothes.
author: Henry J. Kaiser

title: You may not be able to control the situation, but you can always control your reaction.
author: Austin Mcgonigle

title: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
author: Friedrich Schiller

title: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

title: I am a strong believer that outer success comes from inner success.
author: Eben Pagan

title: We seem to gain wisdom more readily through our failures than through our successes. Success often lies just the other side of failure.
author: Leo F. Buscaglia

title: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
author: Michael Jackson

title: Make it a rule of life never to regret and never to look back. Regret is an appalling waste of energy; you can’t build on it; it’s only for wallowing in.
author: Katherine Mansfield

title: To reach our goal, we must sail sometimes with the wind and sometimes against it. But we must sail and not drift, not lie at anchor.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

title: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

title: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Gandhi

title: There’s no better time than the present to be better than we were yesterday.
author: Gary Kelley

title: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
author: Thomas Jefferson

title: The world is a great mirror. It reflects back to you what you are. If you are loving, if you are friendly, if you are helpful, the world will prove loving and friendly and helpful to you. The world is what you are.
author: Thomas Dreier

title: At first dreams seem impossible, then improbable, eventually inevitable.
author: Christopher Reeve

title: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
author: Buddha

title: I used to say, ‘I sure hope things will change.’ Then I learned that the only way things are going to change for me is when I change.
author: Jim Rohn

title: I would rather regret the things that I have done than the things that I have not.
author: Lucille Ball

title: Dreaming is wonderful, goal setting is crucial, but action is supreme. To make something great happen you must get busy and make it happen.
author: Greg Werner

title: It is often merely for an excuse that we say things are impossible.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

title: The happy people are those who are producing something; the bored people are those who are consuming much and producing nothing.
author: William Ralph

title: Experience tells you what to do; confidence allows you to do it.
author: Stan Smith

title: The difference in winning and losing is most often… not quitting.
author: Walt Disney

title: The time to relax is when you don’t have time for it.
author: Sidney J. Harris

title: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within – strength, courage, dignity.
author: Ruby Dee

title: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes of mind.
author: William James

title: You’ve got to get to the stage in life where going for it is more important than winning or losing.
author: Arthur Ashe

title: When defeat comes, accept it as a signal that your plans are not sound. Rebuild those plans and set sail once more toward your coveted goal.
author: Napoleon Hill

title: The beginning is always today.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

title: The secret of getting ahead is getting started. The secret of getting started is breaking your complex overwhelming tasks into small manageable tasks, and then starting on the first one.
author: Mark Twain

title: People are anxious to improve their circumstances, but unwilling to improve themselves. They therefore remain bound.
author: James Allen

title: To dare is to lose one’s footing momentarily. Not to dare is to lose oneself.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

title: I enjoy every opportunity and live every moment. And that is why I have no regrets. It’s when you are not scared of losing that you win everything.
author: Shailendra Singh

title: Our real duty is always found running in the direction of our worthiest desires.
author: Randolph S. Bourne

title: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
author: Oprah Winfrey

title: No dream comes true until you wake up and go to work.
author: Anonymous

title: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
author: Richard Bach

title: You can’t base your life on other people’s expectations.
author: Stevie Wonder

title: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

title: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
author: Swami Sivananda

title: Change. It has the power to uplift, to heal, to stimulate, surprise, open new doors, bring fresh experience and create excitement in life. Certainly it is worth the risk.
author: Leo Buscaglia

title: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have.
author: Eckhart Tolle

title: To accomplish our destiny it is not enough to merely guard prudently against road accidents. We must also cover before nightfall the distance assigned to each of us.
author: Alexis Carrel

title: You may never know what results come of your action, but if you do nothing there will be no result.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

title: Accept no one’s definition of your life, but define yourself.
author: Harvey Fierstein

title: There is no end. There is no beginning. There is only the infinite passion of life.
author: Frederico Fellini

title: What we have to learn to do, we learn by doing.
author: Aristotle

title: Learn everything you can, anytime you can, from anyone you can – there will always come a time when you will be grateful you did.
author: Sarah Caldwell

title: One of the secrets of getting more done is to make a TO DO LIST every day, keep it visible, and use it as a guide to action as you go through the day.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

title: Most people ask for happiness on condition. Happiness can only be felt if you don’t set any condition.
author: Arthur Rubinstein

title: If what you are doing is not moving you towards your goals, then it’s moving you away from your goals.
author: Brian Tracy

title: The best cure for worry, depression, melancholy, brooding, is to go deliberately forth and try to lift with one’s sympathy the gloom of somebody else.
author: Arnold Bennett

title: The bad news: there is no key to the universe. The good news: it was never locked.
author: Swami Beyondananda

title: If I try to be like him, who will be like me?
author: Yiddish proverb

title: For today and its blessings, I owe the world an attitude of gratitude.
author: Clarence E. Hodges

title: We’re so busy watching out for what’s just ahead of us that we don’t take time to enjoy where we are.
author: Calvin & Hobbes

title: The universe doesn’t recognize the difference between small goals and big ones, it responds to your emotion and intent.
author: Peggy McColl

title: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration.
author: William Ellery Channing

title: If every day at work feels like a Friday, then you are doing what you were meant to do.
author: Alan W. Kennedy

title: The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want the most for what you want now.
author: Zig Ziglar

title: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
author: Zig Ziglar

title: Every man dies. Not every man lives. The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.
author: Les Brown

title: Be grateful for what you already have.
author: Vicki Morris

title: “Know the true value of time; snatch, seize, and enjoy every moment of it. No idleness; no laziness; no procrastination; never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.”
author: Lord Chesterfield

title: “I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.”
author: Estee Lauder

title: “Take time to smell the roses and just try smiling to improve your day.”
author: Vicki Morris

title: “Today is life – the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today. Get interested in something. Shake yourself awake. Develop a hobby. Let the winds of enthusiasm sweep through you. Live today with gusto.”
author: Dale Carnegie

title: “What’s money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.”
author: Bob Dylan

title: “A nail is driven out by another nail. Habit is overcome by habit.”
author: Desiderius Erasmus

title: “Most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be.”
author: Abraham Lincoln

title: “Just remember – when you think all is lost, the future remains.”
author: Dr. Robert H. Goddard

title: “The great thing in the world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving.”
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

title: “It’s not knowing what to do, it’s doing what you know.”
author: Anthony Robbins

title: To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness.
author: John Dewey

title: There comes a time when you ought to start doing what you want. Take a job that you love.
author: Warren Buffet

title: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed – there’s so little competition.
author: Elbert Hubbard

title: If my hands are fully occupied in holding on to something, I can neither give nor receive.
author: Dorothee Solle

title: Imagine a hot tub for the mind. That is what meditation is; it can bathe your mind in relaxing thoughts.
author: Eknath Easwaran

title: If you want to have what you have not, you must do what you do not.
author: Taro Gold

title: Create a definite plan for carrying out your desire and begin at once, whether you ready or not, to put this plan into action.
author: Napoleon Hill

title: Enjoy everything that happens in your life, but never make your happiness or success dependent on an attachment to any person, place, or thing.
author: Dr. Wayne Dyer

title: Do it now. It is not safe to leave a generous feeling to the cooling influences of the world.
author: Thomas Guthrie

title: It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect it’s successful outcome.
author: William James

title: “The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.”
author: Steve Jobs

title: “Sometimes life is going to hit you in the head with a brick. Don’t lose faith.”
author: Steve Jobs

title: “It is possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.”
author: Elon Musk

title: “If you define the problem correctly, you almost have the Solution.”
author: Steve Jobs

title: “If you’re bored with life – you don’t get up every morning with a burning desire to do things – you don’t have enough goals.”
author: Lou Holtz

title: “Love yourself and what you do – the only key to success.”
author: Steve Jobs

title: “People should pursue what they’re passionate about. That will make them happier than pretty much anything else.”
author: Elon Musk

title: “I never learn anything talking. I only learn things when I ask questions.”
author: Lou Holtz

title: “Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.”
author: Elon Musk

title: “It’s not the load that breaks you down, it’s the way you carry it.”
author: Lou Holtz

title: “It’s really hard to design products by focus groups. A lot of times, people don’t know what they want until you show it to them.”
author: Steve Jobs

title: “At Tatas, we believe that if we are not among the top three in an industry, we should look seriously at what it would take to become one of the top three players.. or think about exiting the industry”
author: Ratan Tata

title: “There are many things that, if I have to relive, maybe I will do it another way. But I would not like to look back and think what I have not been able to.”
author: Ratan Tata

title: “By honestly acknowledging your past errors, but never damning yourself for them, you can learn to use your past for your own future benefit.”
author: Albert Ellis

title: “If you want to walk fast, walk alone. But if you want to walk far, walk together.”
author: Ratan Tata

title: “If you believe in something, work nights and weekends, it won’t feel like work.”
author: Kevin Rose

title: “Acceptance is not love. You love a person because he or she has lovable traits, but you accept everybody just because they’re alive and human.”
author: Albert Ellis

title: “Don’t be serious, enjoy life as it comes.”
author: Ratan Tata

title: “I don’t care what it is, when it has an LCD screen, it makes it better.”
author: Kevin Rose

title: “People and things do not upset us. Rather, we upset ourselves by believing that they can upset us.”
author: Albert Ellis

title: “Ups and downs in life are very important to keep us going, because a straight line even in an ECG means we are not alive.”
author: Ratan Tata

title: “I love well-designed products that combine form and functionality.”
author: Kevin Rose

title: “You largely constructed your depression. It wasn’t given to you. Therefore, you can deconstruct it.”
author: Albert Ellis

title: “Take the stones people throw at you. And use them to build a monument.”
author: Ratan Tata

title: “A team aligned behind a vision will move mountains.”
author: Kevin Rose

title: “There are three musts that hold us back: I must do well. You must treat me well. And the world must be easy.”
author: Albert Ellis

title: “Power and wealth are not two of my main stakes.”
author: Ratan Tata

title: “There are certain problems that I care about, and those are the things that I invest in to help solve.”
author: Elon Musk

title: “Mahatma Gandhi’s dream of self-reliance can be attained by making use of Internet and technology.”
author: Mukesh Ambani

title: “To do more for the world than the world does for you – that is success.”
author: Henry Ford

title: “I don’t believe in taking right decisions. I take decisions and then make them right.”
author: Ratan Tata

title: “I personally think that money can do very little. And this has been my experience all across.”
author: Mukesh Ambani

title: “I think that’s the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.”
author: Elon Musk

title: “Everybody has equal opportunity, and I think that is true for everything.”
author: Mukesh Ambani

title: “If you don’t think of the future, you won’t have one.”
author: Henry Ford

title: “I admire people who are very successful. But if that success has been achieved through too much ruthlessness, then I may admire that person, but I can’t respect him.”
author: Ratan Tata

title: “The key to making money in angel investing is saying no. You meet with 100 companies and say no to 99 of them.”
author: Kevin Rose

title: “It has been my observation that most people get ahead during the time that others waste.”
author: Henry Ford

title: “Any product that needs a manual to work is broken.”
author: Elon Musk

title: “Essentially, whoever is successful, whoever is going to do things that make a difference, is going to be talked about.”
author: Mukesh Ambani

title: “My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.”
author: Henry Ford

title: “None can destroy iron, but its own rust can! Likewise none can destroy a person, but its own mindset can!”
author: Ratan Tata

title: “Don’t spend too much time planning, release early and often, some things will work, others won’t, refine and move forward and above all forget the money, just make sure you love what you’re doing.”
author: Kevin Rose

title: “I think that Valentine’s Day is only as good as you want it to be. You know, I don’t think it should be anything fancy, nothing crazy. As long as you’re spending time with that person that’s special, I think that’s a great Valentine’s Day.”
author: Prince Royce

title: “Single is an opportunity to live life on your own terms and not apologize.”
author: Mandy Hale

title: “Love is a dream that came to life when we meet.”
author: Unknown

title: “The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.”
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

title: “Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.”
author: Martin Luther King Jr

title: “My alone feels so good, I’ll only have you if you’re sweeter than my solitude.”
author: Warsan Shire

title: “The art of love is largely the art of persistence.”
author: Albert Ellis

title: “The most important thing in the world is family and love.”
author: John Wooden

title: “All you need is love.”
author: Paul McCartney

title: “If I know what love is, it is because of you.”
author: Herman Hesse

title: “Love is so short, forgetting is so long.”
author: Pablo Neruda

title: “There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.”
author: George Sand

title: “We must be our own before we can be another’s.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

title: “If you would be loved, love, and be loveable.”
author: Benjamin Franklin

title: “You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.”
author: Buddha

title: “Where there is love there is life.”
author: Mahatma Gandhi

title: “I love Valentine’s Day! I love it, I love it, I love it. I like having doors opened for me. My favorite romantic comedy is ‘When Harry Met Sally.’ “
author: Ginnifer Goodwin

title: “Life is the flower for which love is the honey.”
author: Victor Hugo

title: “I think men and women will both agree that one of the perks of being single on Valentine’s Day is that you get to keep your money in your pocket.”
author: Sevyn Streeter

title: “If I could reach up and hold a star for every time you’ve made me smile, the entire evening sky would be in the palm of my hand.”
author: Unknown

title: “And in the end, the love you take, is equal to the love you make.”
author: Paul McCartney

title: “If something is important enough, or you believe something is important enough, even if you are scared, you will keep going.”
author: Elon Musk

title: “I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.”
author: Nelson Mandela

title: “Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.”
author: Steve Jobs

title: “If you can’t fly then run, if you can’t run then walk, if you can’t walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.”
author: Martin Luther King Jr

title: “If we tried to think of a good idea, we wouldn’t have been able to think of a good idea. You just have to find the solution for a problem in your own life.”
author: Brian Chesky

title: “Don’t let someone else’s opinion of you become your reality.”
author: Les Brown

title: “Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.”
author: Steve Jobs

title: “Customers want high quality at low prices and they want it now.”
author: Bill Gates

title: “I can’t believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary.”
author: Lou Holtz

title: “In the journey of an entrepreneur, the most important thing is self-belief and the ability to convert that belief into reality.”
author: Mukesh Ambani

title: “Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn’t matter to me. Going to bed at night saying we’ve done something wonderful, that’s what matters to me.”
author: Steve Jobs

title: “Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.”
author: George Addair

title: “We all need people who will give us feedback. That’s how we improve.”
author: Bill Gates

title: “Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.”
author: Warren Buffett

title: “If you can dream it, you can do it.”
author: Walt Disney

title: “I’m as proud of many of the things we haven’t done as the things we have done. Innovation is saying no to a thousand things.”
author: Steve Jobs

title: “It’s fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.”
author: Bill Gates

title: “If everyone is moving forward, then success takes care of itself”
author: Henry Ford

title: “Don’t let others convince you that the idea is good when your gut tells you it’s bad.”
author: Kevin Rose

title: “Stay Hungry, Stay Foolish” – Steve Jobs
author: Steve Jobs
